      <X extends DoubleMatrix>
      X      		 DoubleMatrix.slice​(int beginRow, int beginCol, int endRow, int endCol)
      Returns a view of this matrix The submatrix begins at the specified beginRow,beginColumn and extends to endRow-1,endColumn-1 Thus the size of the matrix is endRow - beginRow, endColumn - beginColumn
      <X extends DoubleMatrix>
